

	-==-


Turbo Mode (v1.3)
Replaces Single Button Mode
Allows players to cancel their moves upon hit.
<https://smashboards.com/threads/turbo-mode-replaces-single-button-mode-v1-3-20xx-4-07-compatible.449823/>
[UnclePunch]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 --- 0x8016B108 ---- 5463E7FE -> 38600000
# Disables initialization of Single Button Mode
# within MatchInfo_SingleButtonModeCheck
------------- 0x803F0AA8 ---- 00007541 -> 00000100
------------- 0x8006B02C ---- 481000D1 -> 38600000
------------- 0x8006B798 ---- 881F2219 -> Branch
